welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aiken, a charming city known for its beautiful horse country and Southern hospitality. We hope you enjoy your time here and discover all the wonderful things our city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and logistics operations at Municipal Airport.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bush Field Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Bush Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnwell Regional Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Barnwell Regional Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
